PROJECT(se05x_ReadState)

FILE(
    GLOB
    files
    *.c
)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(${PROJECT_NAME} ${KSDK_STARTUP_FILE} ${files})

TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/sss/ex/inc)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(
    ${PROJECT_NAME}
    ex_common
    SSS_APIs
)

CREATE_BINARY(${PROJECT_NAME})

IF(
    CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE
    STREQUAL
    "Release"
)
    COPY_TO_SOURCEDIR(
        ${PROJECT_NAME}
        binaries/ex
        ${SMCOM}
    )
ENDIF()
